column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: ships. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix ship: <http://www.example.com/ship#> .ship:Ship a rdfs:Class .ship:name a rdf:Property ;  rdfs:domain ship:Ship ;  rdfs:range xsd:string .ship:length a rdf:Property ;  rdfs:domain ship:Ship ;  rdfs:range xsd:float .ship:buildYear a rdf:Property ;  rdfs:domain ship:Ship ;  rdfs:range xsd:date .ship:builder a rdf:Property ;  rdfs:domain ship:Ship ;  rdfs:range xsd:string .ship:ShipType a rdfs:Class .ship:hasType a rdf:Property ;  rdfs:domain ship:Ship ;  rdfs:range ship:ShipType .ship:CargoShip a rdfs:Class ;  rdfs:subClassOf ship:ShipType .ship:PassengerShip a rdfs:Class ;  rdfs:subClassOf ship:ShipType .ship:Battleship a rdfs:Class ;  rdfs:subClassOf ship:ShipType .ship:Owner a rdfs:Class .ship:ownedBy a rdf:Property ;  rdfs:domain ship:Ship ;  rdfs:range ship:Owner .ship:owns a rdf:Property ;  rdfs:domain ship:Owner ;  rdfs:range ship:Ship .```
